text:
Hi, how can I overwrite the `EOFError` exception message? The reason is that, my script has a lot of files to read in the loop and I want to know which file raises the error. What is the best practice? Logging `@error` before `rethrow()`  on catch? i.e.
```catch EOFError
    @error "Possibly corrupted file" file_path
    rethrow()
end```
Thanks!

elements.text: Hi, how can I overwrite the

catch EOFError
